import React from 'react' import {Formik, Form, Field} from 'formik' import {authAPI} from '../../../api' import s from '../Login/login.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const initialValues = { reset_password: '' } export const ResetPassword = (props) => { const onSubmit = (body) => { debugger const reset ={ token: props.code, password: body.reset_password } authAPI.reset_password(reset) } return(
